util.math

Class ExtendedMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.math.ExtendedMath

  • public class ExtendedMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility-Class with some math operations, which aren't in class Math.

    • Method Detail

      • map

        public static double map(double value,
                         double minRange1,
                         double maxRange1,
                         double minRange2,
                         double maxRange2)
        Maps value which is in first range to second range.

        Table of examples

        Value Min in first range Max in first range Min in second range Max in second range Result
        22.5 0.0 45.0 0.0 100.0 50.0
        1.25 1.25 1.85 1.0 2.0 1.0
        4.0 2.87 9.43 0.0 20.0 3.445121951219512

        Mapping formula: 

        
 (value - minRange1) / (maxRange1 - minRange1) * (maxRange2 - minRange2) + minRange2

        Parameters:
        value - value to map
        minRange1 - the lowest value of first range
        maxRange1 - the highest value of first range
        minRange2 - the lowest value of second range
        maxRange2 - the highest value of second range
        Returns:
        mapped value
